name: Hard 1.16 "The Boys in the Bar" Quiz / Test | 'Cheers'- Season 1 | 10 Questions

questions.text: How did Harry say he got in the bar?
questions.explanation:
through the back door.

	Sam replied, "We don't have a back door." Harry responded to that by saying, "Then it's my secret."

Tom Kenderson.

	Tom Kenderson used to chase women and drink beer with Sam. Sam said some guys went after the women, some got drunk; they couldn't decide so they did both.

questions.text: Who played the author of the autobiography?
questions.explanation:
Alan Autry.

	Alan Autry is best known for his role as Bubba on "In the Heat of the Night". He was born July 31,1952 in Shreveport, LA.

questions.text: What was the name of Sam's "emergency"?
questions.explanation:
Sherry.

	Sam said he had an emergency last night. When Diane asked what her name was, Sam replied "Sherry".

	Sam was unable to read the book due to his "emergency". Since he didn't read it, he didn't know about Tom's big news.

questions.text: What did the man write about that shocked Sam?
questions.explanation:
coming out of the closet.

	Tom wanted Sam to read the book because it was hard for him to tell his former teammates. Diane tried to help Sam by telling him she found holes in the pool table.

options: That Tom might hit on him
That Sam is secretly gay too
questions.explanation:
Cheers becoming a gay bar.

	Norm said that Veto's Pub once let gay people in the bar and within a few weeks it became a gay bar. This episode showed how clueless people can be when it comes to alternative lifestyles.

questions.text: Who was the first person Norm suggested might be gay?
questions.explanation:
Cliff.

	Cliff was a postal worker and did not have a girlfriend so Norm claimed he might be gay. Norm claimed he could spot a gay person "a mile away".

questions.text: Why did Carla say she was not fond of gay men?
questions.explanation:
too much competition.

	Carla claimed there was not that many men out there so when they were gay it meant even less men that she had a chance with. Carla had an interesting view on life.

questions.text: Were the men that Norm and the others thought were gay, gay?
questions.explanation:
No.

	The guys Norm said were gay hit on Diane earlier that day. She said the two men who were gay along with herself had a good time watching Norm and the others making fools of themselves.
